00107 template <class MTYPE>
00108 tpMatrix<MTYPE>::tpMatrix(void)
00109 {
00110   elements      = NULL;
00111   numberRows    = 3;
00112   numberColumns = 3;
00113 
00114   ResetElements();
00115   Zero();
00116 }
00117 
00118 template <class MTYPE>
00119 tpMatrix<MTYPE>::tpMatrix(const int r, const int c=3)
00120 {
00121   elements      = NULL;
00122   numberRows    = r;
00123   numberColumns = c;
00124 
00125   ResetElements();
00126   Zero();
00127 }
00128 
00129 template <class MTYPE>
00130 tpMatrix<MTYPE>::tpMatrix(const tpMatrix<MTYPE> &source)
00131 {
00132   int r = source.GetNumberRows();
00133   int c = source.GetNumberColumns();
00134 
00135   elements      = NULL;
00136   numberRows    = r;
00137   numberColumns = c;
00138 
00139   ResetElements();
00140 
00141   for (int rr=1; rr<=r; rr++)
00142   {
00143     for (int cc=1; cc<=c; cc++)
00144     {
00145       SetElement(rr, cc, source.GetElement(rr, cc));
00146     }
00147   }
00148 }
00149 
00150 template <class MTYPE>
00151 tpMatrix<MTYPE>::~tpMatrix(void)
00152 {
00153   if (elements)
00154   {
00155     delete [] elements;
00156   }
00157 }

00164 template <class MTYPE>
00165 void tpMatrix<MTYPE>::ResetElements(void)
00166 {
00167   if (elements != NULL)
00168   {
00169     delete [] elements;
00170   }
00171 
00172   elements = new MTYPE[numberRows*numberColumns];
00173 }

00196 template <class MTYPE>
00197 MTYPE tpMatrix<MTYPE>::SetElement(const int r, const int c, const MTYPE v)
00198 {
00199   if((r>0 && r<numberRows+1) && (c>0 && c<numberColumns+1))
00200   {
00201     elements[(r-1)*numberColumns+(c-1)] = v;
00202   }
00203   else
00204   {
00205     throw clExceptionTree("Matrix", "SetElement", "Invalid row or column index.");
00206   }
00207 
00208   return(elements[(r-1)*numberColumns+(c-1)]);
00209 }

00228 template <class MTYPE>
00229 MTYPE tpMatrix<MTYPE>::GetElement(const int r, const int c) const
00230 {
00231   MTYPE v;
00232 
00233   if((r>0 && r<numberRows+1) && (c>0 && c<numberColumns+1))
00234   {
00235     v = elements[(r-1)*numberColumns+(c-1)];
00236   }
00237   else
00238   {
00239     throw clExceptionTree("Matrix", "GetElement", "Invalid row or column index.");
00240   }
00241 
00242   return(v);
00243 }

00250 template <class MTYPE>
00251 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::Zero(void)
00252 {
00253   for (int r=1; r<=GetNumberRows(); r++)
00254   {
00255     for (int c=1; c<=GetNumberColumns(); c++)
00256     {
00257       SetElement(r, c, MTYPE(0));
00258     }
00259   }
00260 
00261   return(*this);
00262 }

00268   {
00269     for (int c=1; c<=GetNumberColumns(); c++)
00270     {
00271       SetElement(r, c, MTYPE(1));

00278 template <class MTYPE>
00279 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::Identity(void)
00280 {
00281   int rmax = GetNumberRows();
00282   int cmax = GetNumberColumns();
00283 
00284   if (rmax == cmax)
00285   {
00286     Zero();
00287 
00288     for (int r=1; r<=rmax; r++)
00289     {
00290       SetElement(r, r, MTYPE(1));
00291     }
00292   }
00293 
00294   return(*this);
00295 }

00298 /*
00299 ** Methods for LU-Decomposition
00300 */
00301 
00302 template <class MTYPE>
00303 MTYPE tpMatrix<MTYPE>::LU_Decomp(tpMatrix<int> &index)
00304 {
00305   /*
00306   ** A * x = b
00307   **
00308   ** Define: A = L * U
00309   **
00310   ** L = lower triangular matrix
00311   ** U = upper triangular matrix
00312   */
00313 
00314   int   N = GetNumberRows();
00315   int   iMax;
00316   MTYPE evenOrOdd;
00317   MTYPE tempValue;
00318   MTYPE largeValue;
00319   MTYPE sum;
00320   MTYPE *scale = new MTYPE[N+1];
00321 
00322   evenOrOdd=1;
00323   for(int i=1; i<=N; i++)
00324   {
00325     largeValue=(MTYPE)(0);
00326 
00327     for(int j=1; j<=N; j++)
00328     {
00329       tempValue=fabs(GetElement(i,j));
00330 
00331       if(tempValue>largeValue)
00332       {
00333         largeValue=tempValue;
00334       }
00335     }
00336 
00337     if(largeValue==(MTYPE)(0))
00338     {
00339       throw clExceptionTree("Matrix", "LU_Decomp", "Matrix is singular.");
00340     }
00341 
00342     scale[i]=(MTYPE)(1)/largeValue;
00343   }
00344 
00345   for(int j=1; j<=N; j++)
00346   {
00347     for(int i=1; i<j; i++)
00348     {
00349       sum=GetElement(i,j);
00350 
00351       for(int k=1; k<i; k++)
00352       {
00353         sum-=GetElement(i,k)*GetElement(k,j);
00354       }
00355 
00356       SetElement(i,j,sum);
00357     }
00358 
00359     largeValue=(MTYPE)(0);
00360 
00361     for(int ii=j; ii<=N; ii++)
00362     {
00363       sum=GetElement(ii,j);
00364       for(int k=1; k<j; k++)
00365       {
00366         sum-=GetElement(ii,k)*GetElement(k,j);
00367       }
00368 
00369       SetElement(ii,j,sum);
00370 
00371       tempValue=scale[ii]*fabs(sum);
00372       if(tempValue>=largeValue)
00373       {
00374         largeValue=tempValue;
00375         iMax=ii;
00376       }
00377     }
00378 
00379     if(j!=iMax)
00380     {
00381       for(int k=1; k<=N; k++)
00382       {
00383         tempValue=GetElement(iMax,k);
00384         SetElement(iMax,k,GetElement(j,k));
00385         SetElement(j,k,tempValue);
00386       }
00387 
00388       evenOrOdd=-evenOrOdd;
00389       scale[iMax]=scale[j];
00390     }
00391 
00392     index.SetElement(j,1,iMax);
00393 
00394     if(GetElement(j,j)==(MTYPE)(0))
00395     {
00396       SetElement(j,j,PRECISION);
00397     }
00398 
00399     if(j!=N)
00400     {
00401       tempValue=(MTYPE)(1)/GetElement(j,j);
00402 
00403       for(int i=j+1; i<=N; i++)
00404       {
00405         SetElement(i,j,tempValue*GetElement(i,j));
00406       }
00407     }
00408   }
00409 
00410   delete [] scale;
00411 
00412   return(evenOrOdd);
00413 }
00414 
00415 template <class MTYPE>
00416 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::LU_Subst(tpMatrix<MTYPE> &b, tpMatrix<int> &index)
00417 {
00418   /*
00419   ** A * x = b
00420   **
00421   ** Define: A = L * U
00422   **
00423   ** L = lower triangular matrix
00424   ** U = upper triangular matrix
00425   */
00426 
00427   int           N = GetNumberRows();
00428   tpMatrix<MTYPE> y(N, 1);
00429 
00430   int ii=0;
00431   for(int i=1; i<=N; i++)
00432   {
00433     int   ip  = index.GetElement(i,1);
00434     MTYPE sum = b.GetElement(ip,1);
00435     b.SetElement(ip,1,b.GetElement(i,1));
00436 
00437     if(ii)
00438     {
00439       for(int j=ii; j<=i-1; j++)
00440       {
00441         sum-=GetElement(i,j)*b.GetElement(j,1);
00442       }
00443     }
00444     else if(sum)
00445     {
00446       ii=i;
00447     }
00448 
00449     b.SetElement(i,1,sum);
00450   }
00451 
00452   for(int k=N; k>=1; k--)
00453   {
00454     MTYPE sum=b.GetElement(k,1);
00455 
00456     for(int j=k+1; j<=N; j++)
00457     {
00458       sum-=GetElement(k,j)*b.GetElement(j,1);
00459     }
00460 
00461     b.SetElement(k,1,sum/GetElement(k,k));
00462   }
00463 
00464   return(b);
00465 }
00466 
00467 template <class MTYPE>
00468 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::Solve(tpMatrix<MTYPE> &b)
00469 {
00470   Inverse()*b;
00471   return(*this);
00472 }
00473 
00474 template <class MTYPE>
00475 int tpMatrix<MTYPE>::IsSingular(void)
00476 {
00477   int ret=(0==-1);
00478 
00479   try
00480   {
00481     tpMatrix<MTYPE> M(*this);
00482     tpMatrix<int>   index(M.GetNumberRows(),1);
00483 
00484     M.LU_Decomp(index);
00485   }
00486 
00487   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00488   {
00489     ret=(0==0);
00490   }
00491 
00492   return(ret);
00493 }

00496 /*
00497 ** Methods for tridiagonal matrices
00498 */
00499 
00500 template <class MTYPE>
00501 int tpMatrix<MTYPE>::IsTri(void)
00502 {
00503   int  ret  = 1;
00504   int  rmax = GetNumberRows();
00505   int  cmax = GetNumberColumns();
00506 
00507   if (rmax != cmax)
00508   {
00509     ret = 0;
00510   }
00511   else
00512   {
00513     for(int r=1; r<=rmax; r++)
00514     {
00515       for(int c=1; c<=cmax; c++)
00516       {
00517         MTYPE value = GetElement(r, c);
00518 
00519         if((c == r-1 || c == r || c == r+1) && (value < PRECISION))
00520         {
00521           // Values on the diagonal must not be zero
00522           ret = 0;
00523         }
00524         else if(c != r-1 && c != r && c != r+1 && value > PRECISION)
00525         {
00526           // Values on the diagonal must be zero
00527           ret = 0;
00528         }
00529       }
00530     }
00531   }
00532 
00533   return (ret);
00534 }
00535 
00536 template <class MTYPE>
00537 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::MakeTri(void)
00538 {
00539   // Check if matrix is tridiagonal
00540   if(!IsTri())
00541   {
00542     throw clExceptionTree("Matrix", "MakeTri", "Matrix is not tridiagonal");
00543   }
00544   else
00545   {
00546     // Copy original matrix
00547     tpMatrix<MTYPE> temp(*this);
00548     int rmax = GetNumberRows();
00549 
00550     // Redimension and refill original matrix
00551     SetNumberColumns(3);
00552     for(int r=1; r<=rmax; r++)
00553     {
00554       if(r==1)
00555       {
00556         SetElement(r, 1, (MTYPE) (0));
00557       }
00558       else
00559       {
00560         SetElement(r, 1, temp.GetElement(r, r-1));
00561       }
00562 
00563       SetElement(r, 2, temp.GetElement(r, r));
00564 
00565       if(r==rmax)
00566       {
00567         SetElement(r, 3, (MTYPE) (0));
00568       }
00569       else
00570       {
00571         SetElement(r, 3, temp.GetElement(r, r+1));
00572       }
00573     }
00574   }
00575 
00576   return (*this);
00577 }
00578 
00579 template <class MTYPE>
00580 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::SolveTri(tpMatrix<MTYPE> &vector)
00581 {
00582   // Set up dummy matrix
00583   tpMatrix<MTYPE> dummy(*this);
00584 
00585   // Check for dimensions
00586   int rmax = dummy.GetNumberRows();
00587   int cmax = dummy.GetNumberColumns();
00588 
00589   int rvec = vector.GetNumberRows();
00590   int cvec = vector.GetNumberColumns();
00591 
00592   if (cmax != 3)
00593   {
00594     throw clExceptionTree("Matrix", "SolveTri", "Coefficient matrix not tridiagonal");
00595   }
00596 
00597   if (cvec != 1)
00598   {
00599     throw clExceptionTree("Matrix", "SolveTri", "Solution vector not in column format");
00600   }
00601 
00602   if (rmax != rvec)
00603   {
00604     throw clExceptionTree("Matrix", "SolveTri", "Dimensions do not match");
00605   }
00606 
00607   // Establish upper triangular matrix
00608   for(int r=2; r<=rmax; r++)
00609   {
00610     if(dummy.GetElement(r-1, 2)<PRECISION)
00611     {
00612       dummy.SetElement(r-1, 2, PRECISION);
00613       //throw clExceptionTree("Matrix", "SolveTri", "Division by zero (1).");
00614     }
00615 
00616     MTYPE rr = dummy.GetElement(r, 1)/dummy.GetElement(r-1, 2);
00617     dummy.SetElement(r, 2, dummy.GetElement(r, 2) - rr*dummy.GetElement(r-1, 3));
00618     vector.SetElement(r, 1, dummy.GetElement(r, 1) - rr*vector.GetElement(r-1, 1));
00619   }
00620 
00621   // Back substitution
00622   if(dummy.GetElement(rmax, 2)<PRECISION)
00623   {
00624     dummy.SetElement(rmax, 2, PRECISION);
00625     //throw clExceptionTree("Matrix", "SolveTri", "Division by zero (2).");
00626   }
00627 
00628   vector.SetElement(rmax, 1, vector.GetElement(rmax, 1)/dummy.GetElement(rmax, 2));
00629   {
00630     for(int r=rmax-1; r>=1; r--)
00631     {
00632       if(dummy.GetElement(r, 2)<PRECISION)
00633       {
00634         dummy.SetElement(r, 2, PRECISION);
00635         //throw clExceptionTree("Matrix", "SolveTri", "Division by zero (3).");
00636       }
00637 
00638       vector.SetElement(r, 1, (vector.GetElement(r, 1) - dummy.GetElement(r, 3)*vector.GetElement(r+1, 1))/dummy.GetElement(r, 2));
00639     }
00640   }
00641 
00642   return (vector);
00643 }

00646 /*
00647 ** Methods for matrix transformations
00648 */
00649 
00650 template <class MTYPE>
00651 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::SubMatrix(const int r, const int c)
00652 {
00653   int rtemp, ctemp;
00654 
00655   int rmax = GetNumberRows();
00656   int cmax = GetNumberColumns();
00657 
00658   // Extract TEMP from *THIS
00659   tpMatrix<MTYPE> temp(rmax-1, cmax-1);
00660 
00661   rtemp = 0;
00662   for (int rorg=1; rorg<=rmax; rorg++)
00663   {
00664     if (rorg != r)
00665     {
00666       rtemp++;
00667       ctemp = 0;
00668 
00669       for (int corg=1; corg<=cmax; corg++)
00670       {
00671         if (corg != c)
00672         {
00673           ctemp++;
00674           temp.SetElement(rtemp, ctemp, GetElement(rorg, corg));
00675         }
00676       }
00677     }
00678   }
00679 
00680   //Copy TEMP into *THIS
00681   Assign(temp);
00682 
00683   return(*this);
00684 }
00685 
00686 template <class MTYPE>
00687 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::MirrorRows(void)
00688 {
00689   int           rmax = GetNumberRows();
00690   int           cmax = GetNumberColumns();
00691   tpMatrix<MTYPE> temp(*this);
00692 
00693   for(int r=1; r<=rmax; r++)
00694   {
00695     for(int c=1; c<=cmax; c++)
00696     {
00697       SetElement(rmax+1-r, c, temp.GetElement(r, c));
00698     }
00699   }
00700 
00701   return(*this);
00702 }
00703 
00704 template <class MTYPE>
00705 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::MirrorColumns(void)
00706 {
00707   int           rmax = GetNumberRows();
00708   int           cmax = GetNumberColumns();
00709   tpMatrix<MTYPE> temp(*this);
00710 
00711   for(int c=1; c<=cmax; c++)
00712   {
00713     for(int r=1; r<=rmax; r++)
00714     {
00715       SetElement(r, cmax+1-c, temp.GetElement(r, c));
00716     }
00717   }
00718 
00719   return(*this);
00720 }
00721 
00722 template <class MTYPE>
00723 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::Transpose(void)
00724 {
00725   int           r, c;
00726   tpMatrix<MTYPE> temp(*this);
00727 
00728   // At this stage TEMP is equal to THIS
00729 
00730   // Switch ROWS and COLUMNS
00731   r = temp.GetNumberColumns();
00732   c = temp.GetNumberRows();
00733 
00734   // Redefine matrix (this)
00735   SetNumberRows(r);
00736   SetNumberColumns(c);
00737 
00738   for (int rr=1; rr<=r; rr++)
00739   {
00740     for (int cc=1; cc<=c; cc++)
00741     {
00742       SetElement(rr, cc, temp.GetElement(cc, rr));
00743     }
00744   }
00745 
00746   return(*this);
00747 }
00748 
00749 template <class MTYPE>
00750 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::Inverse(void)
00751 {
00752   int           N = GetNumberRows();
00753   tpMatrix<int>   index(N+1,1);
00754   tpMatrix<MTYPE> b(N, 1);
00755   tpMatrix<MTYPE> M(*this);
00756 
00757   LU_Decomp(index);
00758 
00759   for (int j=1; j<=N; j++)
00760   {
00761     for (int i=1; i<=N; i++)
00762     {
00763       b.SetElement(i, 1, MTYPE(0));
00764     }
00765     b.SetElement(j, 1, MTYPE(1));
00766 
00767     LU_Subst(b, index);
00768 
00769     for (int ii=1; ii<=N; ii++)
00770     {
00771       M.SetElement(ii, j, b.GetElement(ii, 1));
00772     }
00773   }
00774 
00775   Assign(M);
00776 
00777   return(*this);
00778 }
00779 
00780 
00781 /*
00782 ** Methods for matrix operations
00783 */
00784 
00785 template <class MTYPE>
00786 int tpMatrix<MTYPE>::Compare(const tpMatrix<MTYPE> &M) const
00787 {
00788   int ret = 1; // Return value: 0 not equal; 1 equal
00789   int rmax = M.GetNumberRows();
00790   int cmax = M.GetNumberColumns();
00791 
00792   if ((GetNumberRows() == rmax) && (GetNumberColumns() == cmax))
00793   {
00794     for (int r=1; r<=rmax; r++)
00795     {
00796       for (int c=1; c<=cmax; c++)
00797       {
00798         if (fabs(GetElement(r, c)-M.GetElement(r, c)) > PRECISION)
00799         {
00800           ret = 0;
00801         }
00802       }
00803     }
00804   }
00805   else
00806   {
00807     ret = 0;
00808   }
00809 
00810   return(ret);
00811 }
00812 
00813 template <class MTYPE>
00814 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::Assign(const tpMatrix<MTYPE> &m)
00815 {
00816   int rmax = m.GetNumberRows();
00817   int cmax = m.GetNumberColumns();
00818 
00819   numberRows    = rmax;
00820   numberColumns = cmax;
00821   ResetElements();
00822 
00823   for (int r=1; r<=rmax; r++)
00824   {
00825     for (int c=1; c<=cmax; c++)
00826     {
00827       SetElement(r, c, m.GetElement(r, c));
00828     }
00829   }
00830 
00831   return(*this);
00832 }
00833 
00834 template <class MTYPE>
00835 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::Add(const tpMatrix<MTYPE> &m)
00836 {
00837   int rmax = GetNumberRows();
00838   int cmax = GetNumberColumns();
00839 
00840   if ((m.GetNumberRows() == rmax) && (m.GetNumberColumns() == cmax))
00841   {
00842     for (int r=1; r<=rmax; r++)
00843     {
00844       for (int c=1; c<=cmax; c++)
00845       {
00846         SetElement(r, c, GetElement(r, c) + m.GetElement(r, c));
00847       }
00848     }
00849   }
00850   else
00851   {
00852     throw clExceptionTree("Matrix", "Add", "Dimensions of matrices do not match.");
00853   }
00854 
00855   return(*this);
00856 }
00857 
00858 template <class MTYPE>
00859 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::Subtract(const tpMatrix<MTYPE> &m)
00860 {
00861   tpMatrix<MTYPE> temp(m);
00862 
00863   Add(temp.Multiply(MTYPE(-1.0)));
00864 
00865   return(*this);
00866 }
00867 
00868 template <class MTYPE>
00869 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::Multiply(const MTYPE v)
00870 {
00871   int rmax = GetNumberRows();
00872   int cmax = GetNumberColumns();
00873 
00874   for (int r=1; r<=rmax; r++)
00875   {
00876     for (int c=1; c<=cmax; c++)
00877     {
00878       SetElement(r, c, GetElement(r, c) * v);
00879     }
00880   }
00881 
00882   return(*this);
00883 }
00884 
00885 template <class MTYPE>
00886 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::Divide(const MTYPE v)
00887 {
00888   if (v != MTYPE(0))
00889   {
00890     Multiply(MTYPE(1)/v);
00891   }
00892 
00893   return(*this);
00894 }
00895 
00896 template <class MTYPE>
00897 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::PreMultiply(const tpMatrix<MTYPE> &m)
00898 {
00899   // M is the first matrix, *THIS the second
00900   int nr1 = m.GetNumberRows();
00901   int nc1 = m.GetNumberColumns();
00902 
00903   int nr2 = GetNumberRows();
00904   int nc2 = GetNumberColumns();
00905 
00906   if (nc1 == nr2)
00907   {
00908     tpMatrix<MTYPE> temp(nr1, nc2);
00909 
00910     for (int c2=1; c2<=nc2; c2++)
00911     {
00912       for (int r1=1; r1<=nr1; r1++)
00913       {
00914         MTYPE  res(0);
00915 
00916         for (int c1=1; c1<=nc1; c1++)
00917         {
00918           res = res + m.GetElement(r1, c1) * GetElement(c1, c2); //Remember c1 = r2
00919         }
00920 
00921         temp.SetElement(r1, c2, res);
00922       }
00923     }
00924 
00925     Assign(temp);
00926   }
00927   else
00928   {
00929     throw clExceptionTree("Matrix", "PreMultiply", "Dimensions of matrices do not match.");
00930   }
00931 
00932   return(*this);
00933 }
00934 
00935 template <class MTYPE>
00936 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::PostMultiply(const tpMatrix<MTYPE> &m)
00937 {
00938   // *THIS is the first matrix, M the second
00939   int nr1 = GetNumberRows();
00940   int nc1 = GetNumberColumns();
00941 
00942   int nr2 = m.GetNumberRows();
00943   int nc2 = m.GetNumberColumns();
00944 
00945   if (nc1 == nr2)
00946   {
00947     tpMatrix<MTYPE> temp(nr1, nc2);
00948 
00949     for (int c2=1; c2<=nc2; c2++)
00950     {
00951       for (int r1=1; r1<=nr1; r1++)
00952       {
00953         MTYPE res(0);
00954 
00955         for (int c1=1; c1<=nc1; c1++)
00956         {
00957           res = res + GetElement(r1, c1) * m.GetElement(c1, c2); //Remember c1 = r2
00958         }
00959 
00960         temp.SetElement(r1, c2, res);
00961       }
00962     }
00963 
00964     Assign(temp);
00965   }
00966   else
00967   {
00968     throw clExceptionTree("Matrix", "PostMultiply", "Dimensions of matrices do not match.");
00969   }
00970 
00971   return(*this);
00972 }
00973 
00974 template <class MTYPE>
00975 MTYPE tpMatrix<MTYPE>::Minor(const int r, const int c)
00976 {
00977   MTYPE ret(0);
00978 
00979   int rmax = GetNumberRows();
00980   int cmax = GetNumberColumns();
00981 
00982   if (rmax == cmax && rmax > 1)
00983   {
00984     tpMatrix<MTYPE> temp(*this);
00985 
00986     temp.SubMatrix(r, c);
00987     ret = temp.Determinant();
00988   }
00989 
00990   return(ret);
00991 }
00992 
00993 template <class MTYPE>
00994 MTYPE tpMatrix<MTYPE>::Cofactor(const int r, const int c)
00995 {
00996   int   fact = -1;
00997   MTYPE ret(0);
00998 
00999   for (int i=2; i<=r+c; i++)
01000   {
01001     fact = -fact;
01002   }
01003 
01004   ret = Minor(r, c) * fact;
01005 
01006   return(ret);
01007 }
01008 
01009 template <class MTYPE>
01010 MTYPE tpMatrix<MTYPE>::Determinant(void)
01011 {
01012   MTYPE ret(1);
01013   int   rmax=GetNumberRows();
01014   int   cmax=GetNumberColumns();
01015 
01016   if (rmax == cmax)
01017   {
01018     tpMatrix<int>   index(rmax,1);
01019     tpMatrix<MTYPE> M(*this);
01020 
01021     ret=M.LU_Decomp(index);
01022 
01023     for (int i=1; i<=rmax; i++)
01024     {
01025       ret *= M.GetElement(i, i);
01026     }
01027   }
01028 
01029   return(ret);
01030 }
01031 
01032 template <class MTYPE>
01033 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::Adjoint(void)
01034 {
01035   tpMatrix<MTYPE> temp(*this);
01036 
01037   int rmax = GetNumberRows();
01038   int cmax = GetNumberColumns();
01039 
01040   if (rmax == cmax && rmax > 1)
01041   {
01042     for (int r=1; r<=rmax; r++)
01043     {
01044       for (int c=1; c<=cmax; c++)
01045       {
01046         SetElement(r, c, temp.Cofactor(r, c));
01047       }
01048     }
01049 
01050     Transpose();
01051   }
01052 
01053   return(*this);
01054 }
01055 
01056 template <class MTYPE>
01057 int tpMatrix<MTYPE>::Rank(void)
01058 {
01059   int ret  = 0;
01060   int rmax = GetNumberRows();
01061   int cmax = GetNumberColumns();
01062 
01063   if (rmax == cmax)
01064   {
01065     if (rmax > 1)
01066     {
01067       if (this->Determinant() == MTYPE(0))
01068       {
01069         tpMatrix<MTYPE> temp(*this);
01070 
01071         temp.SubMatrix(1, 1);
01072         ret = temp.Rank();
01073       }
01074       else
01075       {
01076         ret = rmax;
01077       }
01078     }
01079     else
01080     {
01081       ret = 1;
01082     }
01083   }
01084 
01085   return(ret);
01086 }

01090 ** Redefinition of operators

01092 
01093 template <class MTYPE>
01094 int tpMatrix<MTYPE>::operator==(const tpMatrix<MTYPE> &m) const
01095 {
01096   return(Compare(m));
01097 }
01098 
01099 template <class MTYPE>
01100 int tpMatrix<MTYPE>::operator!=(const tpMatrix<MTYPE> &m) const
01101 {
01102   return(!Compare(m));
01103 }
01104 
01105 template <class MTYPE>
01106 MTYPE tpMatrix<MTYPE>::operator()(const int r, const int c) const
01107 {
01108   return(GetElement(r,c));
01109 }
01110 
01111 template <class MTYPE>
01112 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::operator=(const tpMatrix<MTYPE> &m)
01113 {
01114   return(Assign(m));
01115 }
01116 
01117 template <class MTYPE>
01118 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::operator+(const tpMatrix<MTYPE> &m)
01119 {
01120   return(Add(m));
01121 }
01122 
01123 template <class MTYPE>
01124 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::operator-(const tpMatrix<MTYPE> &m)
01125 {
01126   return(Subtract(m));
01127 }
01128 
01129 template <class MTYPE>
01130 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::operator*(const MTYPE v)
01131 {
01132   return(Multiply(v));
01133 }
01134 
01135 template <class MTYPE>
01136 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::operator*(const tpMatrix<MTYPE> &m)
01137 {
01138   return(PostMultiply(m));
01139 }
01140 
01141 template <class MTYPE>
01142 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::operator/(const MTYPE v)
01143 {
01144   return(Divide(v));
01145 }
01146 
01147 template <class MTYPE>
01148 tpMatrix<MTYPE>& tpMatrix<MTYPE>::operator/(const tpMatrix<MTYPE> &m)
01149 {
01150   tpMatrix<MTYPE> temp(m);
01151 
01152   PostMultiply(temp.Inverse());
01153   return(*this);
01154 }
